last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 8
last_episode_to_air.overview: When Jiro kidnaps Taki and threatens to throw her from a rooftop, the Mori brothers must decide what they’re willing to sacrifice in order to save her life.

name: Giri/Haji
overview: Soulful thriller set in Tokyo and London, exploring the butterfly effect of a single murder across two cities. A dark, witty and daring examination of morality and redemption.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A detective from Tokyo scours London for his missing brother, who's been involved with the Yakuza and accused of murder.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Tokyo detective Kenzo Mori is sent to London to find the brother he thought was dead, now reappeared and wanted for a vicious killing that threatens to tear both cities apart.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: As the body count rises in Tokyo, an untouchable Mr Abbot tries to force Kenzo out of London – but he can't go home without Yuto, and has begun to form other attachments.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: A reunion is not what Kenzo or Yuto had hoped for. Meanwhile, it is time for the truth to come out as a surprise visitor arrives from Tokyo, and Rodney contends with a shock death.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: As the Mori brothers end up on opposite sides of a frantic Soho gun battle, Yuto relives the split-second decisions that brought them all to this point.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: In the aftermath of the gunfight, Kenzo has a choice to make - send Yuto home to face certain death or allow the war to continue and destroy the city he is duty-bound to protect.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: As the Mori family set aside their conflicts to mourn Hotaka’s death, it becomes apparent that everyone has their own demons to face, courage to find or decisions to make.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Ian threatens to hand incriminating photos of Yuto to the police, leaving Kenzo and Sarah divided in stopping him and forcing each to confront the mistakes of their past.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: When Jiro kidnaps Taki and threatens to throw her from a rooftop, the Mori brothers must decide what they’re willing to sacrifice in order to save her life.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: A detective from Tokyo scours London for his missing brother, who's been involved with the Yakuza and accused of murder.
